text:
瞭解隨著 Meta AI 技術的服務範圍擴大，我們會如何使用您的資料
您好 [redacted_name]：
我們即將要擴大 Meta AI 技術體驗的服務範圍。 Meta AI 技術整合了多項生成式 AI 功能和體驗，例如 Meta AI 和 AI 廣告創意工具，以及提供相關技術支援的各種模型。
對您的影響
trans:
Understand how we use your data as the scope of Meta AI technology services expands,
Dear [redacted_name],
We are about to expand the scope of Meta AI technology experiences. Meta AI technology integrates various generative AI features and experiences, such as Meta AI and AI ad creative tools, as well as various models providing related technical support.
Impact on you
